The true report of the burnyng of the steple and church of Poules in London Pilkington, James, 1520?-1576.
[16] p.
At the west ende of Paules Church, at the sygne of the Hedghogge by Wyllyam Seres. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendus solum., Imprynted at London : Anno. 1561. The. x. of Iune [1561]
By James Pilkington. Running title reads: The true reporte of the burning of Poules. Signatures: A. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
